radiographic_examinations.findings: Bilateral multiple lung nodules (maximum diameter 1.2 cm) and multiple thyroid nodules (measuring from 0.3 to 0.5 cm in diameter); 166 nodules measuring 2 to 17 mm in diameter distributing across 5 lobes of the lung, including pure ground glass nodules (GGN), partial-solid nodules, solid nodules, and cavitary nodules; one of the largest lesions in the left upper lobe had become progressively solid.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: From November 2012 to April 2016, the CT scan showed an increase in the number and size of nodules, with one lesion in the left upper lobe becoming progressively solid.
